Chapter I

The drug issue

For centuries, drugs have gnawed at the Filipino population counting 100.7 million inhabitants. But to understand why methamphetamine is growing in the country, it is interesting to look at the reasons for this scourge.

Drugs consumption in Philippines

WHO CONSUME DRUGS IN PHILIPPINES ?

USE OF DRUGS CONSEQUENCES

ON PEOPLE

Becoming addicted to drugs can be really fast. Addicted people don’t work and can became dangerous (physically violent). They steal or commit crimes to buy drugs.

A big proportion of crimes is committed by individuals who are trying to satisfy their drug habit.

ON GOVERNMENT

The government needs to spend large amounts of money on tackling drug problems.

According to the president Duterte, if nothing changes, the country can become a narco-state.

REASONS EXPLAINING THE HIGH RATE DRUG CONSUMPTION

MONEY
GEOGRAPHIC
PRODUCTION
AREAS
WOMEN

Lots of Filipinos choose to be involved in the drug traffic due to the promise of a higher income.

The international drug syndicate use the country as a transit center for illicit drug traffic.

The Philippines produces a lot of synthetic drugs and cultivate marijuana.

The international Airport of Ninoy Aquino has been identified as a huge center for illicit drug traffic.

Women are forced by drug syndicates to pass out drugs by threatening them to harm their family.
